description.raw:
This is a work in progress. We will probably merge this pull request in some unfinished state and continue from there, the approach I'm taking is:

* Remove anything which isn't needed anymore, such as the need to link to and include anything related to `QWidgets`
* Remove old functionality as it is implemented with the new approach
* Comment out functionality which doesn't work anymore, and hasn't been migrated yet, this includes several classes, plugins and tests
* Roughly converting a few plugins just to test the high level functionality and get familiar with QtQuick, without caring about usability for now

---

## What should work

* All command line tools

* Running an empty window, for example:

    * `ign gui`
    * `ign gui -v 4`

* Running a standalone plugin, for example:

    * `ign gui -s Publisher`
    * `ign gui -s TopicEcho`

* Running a config file, for example:

    * `ign gui -c examples/config/pubsub.config`

* The plugin example under `examples/plugin/hello_world`

* All uncommented tests

---

I'm not going to write a lot about what has been done because great part of it is still subject to change. Feel free to ask about any details.

title: [WIP] Migrate to QtQuick
